sentences.en: He appears to have backed himself into a tight corner.
sentences.cn: 他似乎已把自己逼入了困境。

sentences.en: He held on tight but she prised it from his fingers.
sentences.cn: 他抓得很紧，但她还是掰开他的手，把它拿走了。

sentences.en: her talent for talking her way out of tight corners.
sentences.cn: 她能自我摆脱困境的谈吐天赋。

sentences.en: Hold tight to the handrail!
sentences.cn: 抓紧扶手！

sentences.en: I kept my eyes tight shut .
sentences.cn: 我双眼紧闭。

sentences.en: I was shoehorning myself into my skin-tight ball gown.
sentences.cn: 我正拼命把自己塞进我的紧身晚礼服里。

sentences.en: It is better to stretch the tight muscles first.
sentences.cn: 最好先伸展一下僵硬的肌肉。

sentences.en: It's difficult to cram everything into a tight schedule.
sentences.cn: 日程紧，很难把所有事情都安排进去。

sentences.en: Just hold tight to my hand and follow along.
sentences.cn: 抓紧我的手，跟着我。

sentences.en: Mickey favoured tight skirts with a hemline at the knee.
sentences.cn: 米基喜欢长度及膝的紧身短裙。

sentences.en: My shoes were so tight that I could hardly walk.
sentences.cn: 鞋子很紧，我几乎不能走路。

sentences.en: Sarah came forward with a tight and angry face.
sentences.cn: 萨拉走上前来，紧绷着脸，怒气冲冲。

sentences.en: Security is tight this week at the polling sites.
sentences.cn: 这个星期，各投票点的安全工作抓得很严。

sentences.en: She has to work within the limits of a fairly tight budget.
sentences.cn: 她不得不在相当紧张的预算范围内精打细算。

sentences.en: She is wearing tight, black leggings and a baggy green jersey.
sentences.cn: 她身穿黑色紧身裤和一件宽松的绿色针织套衫。

sentences.en: She walked off the plane in a miniskirt and tight top.
sentences.cn: 她身穿迷你裙和紧身上衣走下了飞机。

sentences.en: The animal’s body was curled up in a tight little ball.
sentences.cn: 这个动物的身体紧紧地缩成一小团。

sentences.en: The baby lay on his back with his eyes closed tight.
sentences.cn: 那个婴儿仰面躺着，两眼紧闭。

sentences.en: The jacket is rather a tight fit (= it fits too tightly ) .
sentences.cn: 这件夹克衫太紧了。

sentences.en: The people sleep on sun loungers packed tight, end to end.
sentences.cn: 人们躺在首尾相连、密密排在一起的日光浴床上。

sentences.en: tight jeans
sentences.cn: 紧身牛仔裤

sentences.en: Within minutes she was outside, closing her bedroom door tight behind her.
sentences.cn: 不出几分钟，她就出去了，并把卧室的门紧紧带上了。

phrases.phrase: a tight corner (或 spot 或 place)

phrases.tran_cn: 稳坐不动；坚持主张；静待事态的发展
供不应求的市场；交投活跃而差价小的市场
紧缩的货币政策；紧缩信用政策
n. 处境困难；极度拥挤；狭道
